name: Dice Knight (Filtrax)
description:
The Dice Knight rolls dice to decide what his next move is.
Change the sides of his dice to help him survive against an orc ambush!

The game seems to lag when played in fullscreen. Try playing without fullscreen in such case.

Made by a solo-dev in 48h for GMTK 2022 GameJam.

HOW TO PLAY:

The Dice Knight will roll his die every 2s (1,5s in Blitz mode and 3s in slow mode) and perform the action corresponding to the result.
Change what actions are available by clicking on actions falling on the left-hand side then click on any action slot to replace it.
SPACE to pause the game.

IPMPORTANT NOTE:

You CAN still swap actions when the game is paused. This started as a bug but I decided to keep it as it can make the game less frantic and more strategic and accessible.
